"Volcanic Guerillas":
"The volcanic caves of Amduscia are
infested with Darkers. The dragons are
fighting back, but the corruption is
spreading.
Deploy to the volcanic caves, engage
the Darkers, and neutralize any affected
Dragonkin.

――――――――――――――――――――
Fracaso: Cuando expira el limite de tiempo"
"Derrotar a los enemigos hasta que se acaben!"
